newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RUGBY UNION-NATAL BEAT WAIKATO CHIEFS IN SUPER 12.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-NATAL BEAT WAIKATO CHIEFS IN SUPER 12.

text.p: Natal of South Africa beat the Waikato Chiefs 33-15 (halftime 13-8) in Friday's Super 12 rugby match at Albany Stadium in Auckland.
Natal - Tries: Adrian Garvey (2), Carbous van der Westhuizen. Penalties: Gavin Lawless (4). Conversions: Gavin Lawless (3).
Waikato Chiefs - Tries: Glen Osborne, Glenn Taylor. Penalties: Blair Feeney. Conversion: Blair Feeney.
